attributes.action:
Ban burning of household/garden waste
In residential areas .
attributes.additional_details: They're usually full of unknown toxins and pollute the atmosphere and cause health issues and are antisocial
attributes.background: Please ban the burning of household waste and garden waste in back gardens

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624014

You cannot get rid of household waste if it will cause pollution or harm people’s health. This includes burning it.
